snippet: The government of Prime Minister David Cameron said it would create a sovereign wealth fund to invest future proceeds from oil and gas extracted from shale deposits.
abstract: British government says that it will establish sovereign wealth fund with proceeds from extracting natural gas from shale; move is another step by government of Prime Min David Cameron to encourage development of shale gas industry and overcome opposition to hydraulic fracturing.
lead_paragraph: The government of Prime Minister David Cameron said it would create a sovereign wealth fund to invest future proceeds from oil and gas extracted from shale deposits.

headline.main: Britain Plans for Future of Shale Oil and Gas Industry
headline.print_headline: Britain Plans for Future of Shale Oil and Gas Industry
